description: Detects when a Microsoft Cloud App Security reported when a user or IP address uses an app that is not sanctioned to perform an activity that resembles an attempt to exfiltrate information from your organization. Author: Austin Songer @austinsonger. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Data Exfiltration to Unsanctioned Apps
query: (eventSource:"SecurityComplianceCenter" AND eventName:"Data\ exfiltration\ to\ unsanctioned\ apps" AND status:"success")
